column5: Enjoy our new stilt home in south Rockport with partial view of Aransas Bay and close to all Rockport has to offer. Fishing, hunting, kayaking and beaches are all nearby. Amenities include three TVs with cable, WiFi, exterior security cameras, beautiful landscaping and comfy Adirondack chairs on upper deck and porch swing and picnic table below, grill and outside shower. Also features utility room with washer and dryer, granite and tile throughout.
